## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G06370](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G06370)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATNHX4, NHX4</u>
- **Gene Name:** sodium hydrogen exchanger 4
- **Description:**   sodium hydrogen exchanger 4;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_124398]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Increased sensitivity to oryzalin, roots significantly shortened.
